pr_title: [plugin-web-app] Add possibility to override browser's proxy host

timeline.author: uarlouski
valfirst

replies.bodyText: InetAddress will resolve it, and there is no guarantee that it could be resolved from the machine where the tests running
replies.author: ikalinin1

replies.bodyText:
Having host.docker.internal it will throw UnknownHostException with a trace:
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: host.docker.internal: nodename nor servname provided, or not known
	at java.base/java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress$PlatformNameService.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:930)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(InetAddress.java:1499)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress$NameServiceAddresses.get(InetAddress.java:849)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1489)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1348)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1282)
	at java.base/java.net.InetAddress.getByName(InetAddress.java:1232)
	at org.vividus.proxy.Proxy.createSeleniumProxy(Proxy.java:133)
replies.author: ikalinin1

timeline.message: [plugin-web-app] Add possibility to override browser's proxy host
